entry.name: gap
entry.label: Pixels between the windows and screen edges

entry.name: floatX
entry.label: Floating Windows preset horizontal size value in percentage representing factor of screen size, zero disables the feature

entry.name: floatY
entry.label: Floating Windows preset vertical size value in percentage representing factor of screen size, zero disables the feature

entry.name: follow
entry.label: Go to the next busy desktop when the last window of a desktop is closed

entry.name: centerTo
entry.label: Tile small clients to the center of the tile instead of the center of the screen

entry.name: liveTiling
entry.label: Tile the windows live when dragging and resizing with mouse

entry.name: ignoredClients
entry.label: Programs that should be ignored by the script (f.ex. "kate", "steam")

entry.name: ignoreJava
entry.label: Ignores all Java programs if set to true

entry.name: ignoredCaptions
entry.label: (Parts of) Window captions that should be ignored by the script (f.ex "move to trash")

entry.name: fixedClients
entry.label: Clients that are aligned (position) but not resized with the layout
